name: Tonya Willprecht
text: I had an order to send to a friend who was recovering at a local facility in DL. Natalie helped she was friendly and seemed eager to help! I really appreciated her!! Thank you Natalie!!

name: Todd Mitchell
text: My wife and I came here for lunch today.  We had not been here since the remodeled and it looked great!   It is so nice and open and fresh looking!  I snapped photos of my  plates of the incredible food we had!  We were reminded that we should really be coming here more often!

name: outdoor moto
text: Need to learn what hand toss really is. I love pizza hut, lately iv always asked for hand toss and lately its like thin crust as they would put it in a pan and roll it out. Hand toss is when you get those random bubbles all in the pizza from the dough. Really needs to go back the old way tho.

name: Blue Night
text: The food was really good. You sit down, wait to be asked for what kind of pizza(s) your ordering and what to drink. The food comes out nice and warm or hot. But its all really tasteful.

name: Mark thelastatlasguy
text: Great place to bring the family... large and small!

name: Damean Polzin
text: Always good pizza, fast service

name: Royce Germain
text: Never have a complaint about the food. Service was a little slow. One server working the whole floor, but he was doing his best to keep up.

name: Jessica Stein
text: Excellent Service! I went here this past Wednesday evening, the two servers were marvelous! On top of everything! Place was well kept, fast service, and great food! Our server, Lexi, was super sweet and made sure everything was perfect for my family. I will be coming back!

name: Brenda Beebe Wieland
text: Poor service. Called before leaving work to order a pizza to pick up. Gal put me on hold right away. That didn't bother me but the receiver was just laid down not on hold. After waiting 5 min - I timed it- I hung up. I knew they wouldn't …More

name: Tia McBee
text: The delivery person forgot my soda but was more than willing to go back and get it for me, I told her not to worry about. So the manager gave me a five dollar credit.

name: Beth Villebrun
text: The food was great

name: Gabe Mendez
text: Having the Buffet for only $6.99 what a great deal. The place is clean and the staff are friendly.

name: dark wizard
text: Great place reviews are way to critical it isn't supposed to be fancy

name: Chris Lange
text: we took our Cub Scout Pack there. We called ahead and they had everything set up ready to go the minute we got there.  The food was excellent the service was excellent!! …More

name: Nicole Rydell
text: Fast take out service. Recommend using the online app for discounts and specials, it will save you tons of money.

name: David Flores
text: Of all the  Pizza Huts I have  been to, Detroit lakes locations is the best  one I have ever been to!

name: Cindi Leach
text: The staff was very helpful when we showed up impromtu with our crowd of 5 adults and 5 children under 5. With positive and welcoming attitudes they put a table together that would accomodate us and then we enjoyed fresh, hot pizza of every kind and salad bar that offered everything and freshly prepared.

name: Annjlena Anna
text: They have amazing pizza and the people there are nice.

name: Carrie Schultes
text: Pizza was raw I've eaten here many times prior n worked for pizza hut in the past the so called manager did not try to make it right said most people order it well done.....no discount no offer for a new pizza ....no tip n will not be back

name: Dianna Noland
text: Took over 45 minutes to get our bread sticks and all of our food was cold when we got it

name: Ultima Gaming
text: Great staff and great service!

name: Nathaniel Christianson
text: Pretty good service, a bit dirty but was at the end of the day so very forgivable!

name: Lori Vigesaa
text: I went for dinner and was impressed how fast the service was and to see how well the staff got along with each other. They seemed to like their job and treated the customers very well with check ins and smiles. Young staff that still understand what customer service is all about. I will definitely go there again!

name: Mindy Jones
text: My family LOVED it!!! The crust was so soft and fluffy..wow!! GREAT JOB TO EVERYBODY..and to miss amber your AWESOME! LOVE the attitude very calm and respectful. Keep on ROCKIN..!! TO cooks very AWESOME!! Delivery guy wow your attitude ROCKS!! If I could give ya all a 20 for overall I would !!

name: domino807 framed
text: It was ok not the best

name: Daniel York
text: Been going here for years with children.  Some managers are great but lexi had a attitude about someone taking our order and not submitting it.  She did take 20 percent off the bill.  No apologies but ssis will people make mistakes.  And i …More

name: Ben Lofgren
text: I love the Pizza Hut chain, but the service at this location is non-existent. My family needed to eat somewhere else.  One other family was present and we never got served. Right when we arrived we were told to wait a moment. We waited and …More

name: Andrea Huberty
text: Newly remodeled, still a great buffet!

name: Thomas Deutschman
text: Great Pizza as long as you order one because the lunch buffet pizzas they put no sauce on. Also order to go pizzas sometimes you get call that they are out of them for the night. Must mean they not make dough from scratch anymore to run out of Pizza dough

name: Jake Porter
text: Chicken Alfredo was possibly the best I've ever had!

name: kmart
text: I WORK HERE STOP ASKING ME TO REVIEW PIZZA HUT EVERY TIME I GO TO WORK

name: Rita Welle
text: Slow service and the workers are in way over their heads.  They chance efficiency by understaffing. Not the co-workers fault, more than likely the managers being too cheap and inhumane.

name: Denise Levy
text: Great service.

name: Joe Ruiz
text: All you can eat buffet for a great price! The staff is super friendly and brings you a refill before your drink is even empty!

name: Debra Fink
text: Excellent food, great service, and great prices!

name: Kris Snyder
text: Great lunch buffet.  Hot food. Wonderful service.  Location can be hard to find

name: Jake Rousu
text: Terrible sat for 20 mins never got our drinks or our order taken and a table that sat down after us got their order and drinks will never be back

name: Nancy Rider
text: They dont wash their hands after cleaning nasty dinning area.  Afraid to eat buffet after what Natalie (manager) said she hates her workers arnt following cleaning procedures .    great thing tp tell customers!     Smh

name: Becky Pickett
text: The server never smiled not once! Food was great but dang the waitress needs to be way more friendly if she wants to get tips!!!

name: Tammy Wilson
text: Buffet was a total waste of money. Place was not very busy for lunch, buffet was empty with little to no choices, ask the waitress and she replied "we just got slammed" no you didn't. The place wasn't busy when I walked in or while I was there. POOR Customer Service seem to be a thing in Detroit Lakes Area

name: Kevin Olson
text: Fast service.

name: James Manypenny
text: Been eating for over  40 minutes for food

name: Loren Teske
text: It’s the pizza you alway Get when you go here. It’s hit and miss. No big deal I will always go to Pizza Hut. But I don’t expect it to be a 5 star restaurant.

name: Dan Benscoter
text: Always available. Good fod.

name: Ginnie Donovan
text: Service a bit off but great food.

name: April Gonzalez
text: I waited for 45 minutes for my food I left hell i should get a free meal waiting that long. Also they dont carry there whites sauce and thats the main reason I go to Detroit lakes Pizza Hut.

name: Paige Wagner
text: Seriously, your establishment isn't worth the time. Ordered a pizza than got a call saying you had no drivers. You just lost a customer.

name: Amanda Wadena
text: Pizza's good, service is alright.

name: k waffen
text: Wonderful service

name: Gary Thorstenson
text: The place was a mess the booth we had tonight had food on the floor the place looked like they had a food fight in there

name: brittany swee
text: Cheesy bread and wings are awesome

name: jessica Anderson
text: you just lost a customer
